about_me.title: About Me
about_me.description: I am a Front-End Developer with 2.6 years of experience specializing in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Next.js. Passionate about building user-friendly and high-performance web applications, I enjoy crafting intuitive UI/UX experiences and optimizing front-end performance. Always eager to learn and stay updated with the latest technologies in the web development ecosystem.

frontend_developer_at_ptt.title: Front-End Developer at PTT Digital Solution (Outsourced Onsite)
frontend_developer_at_ptt.list_1: Developed and maintained a POS BackOffice Web Application for a large-scale retail business.
frontend_developer_at_ptt.list_2: Built the front-end using Next.js and TypeScript, ensuring scalability and performance.
frontend_developer_at_ptt.list_3: Worked closely with back-end developers and business teams (without a dedicated UX/UI team) to design and implement UI components based on business requirements.
frontend_developer_at_ptt.list_4: Integrated various APIs to support POS operations, data analytics, and real-time updates.

fullstack_developer_at_ics.title: ICreativeSystems Co.,Ltd – Full-Stack Developer
fullstack_developer_at_ics.list_1: Transitioned to full-stack development for the Influencer Hiring Web App.
fullstack_developer_at_ics.list_2: Focused primarily on CRUD operations using Golang and PostgreSQL for back-end development.
fullstack_developer_at_ics.list_3: Developed and integrated RESTful APIs to handle data storage and retrieval.
fullstack_developer_at_ics.list_4: Maintained and improved the front-end with React.js and TypeScript, ensuring a smooth user experience.
fullstack_developer_at_ics.list_5: Worked with UX/UI designers, back-end developers, and testers to ensure a cohesive development process.

pos_project.title: Project 1: POS System (Electron.js)
pos_project.list_1: Took over and maintained an existing POS system built with Electron.js, ensuring stability and performance improvements.
pos_project.list_2: Implemented UI enhancements and bug fixes, optimizing system usability and responsiveness.
pos_project.list_3: Integrated RESTful APIs to synchronize data and enhance real-time processing.
pos_project.list_4: Developed fully responsive UI for different screen sizes and resolutions.
pos_project.list_5: Collaborated closely with UX/UI designers, back-end developers, and testers to improve overall user experience.

hashu_project.title: Project 2: Influencer Hiring Web App(HashU)
hashu_project.list_1: Developed a web application for influencer hiring, focusing on seamless user experience and high-performance UI.
hashu_project.list_2: Used React.js, TypeScript, and Material-UI (MUI) to build a scalable and responsive front-end.
hashu_project.list_3: Integrated RESTful APIs to fetch and display influencer data dynamically.
hashu_project.list_4: Ensured the application was fully responsive across different devices and screen resolutions.
hashu_project.list_5: Worked with UX/UI designers, back-end developers, and testers to refine the application’s design and functionality.

contact_me.title: Get In Touch
contact_me.description: Have a question or want to work together? Feel free to contact me using the form below or through my social media channels.
